title: I Have a Daoist Temple - Novel Updates
author: North Shrike   北伯劳
description:
Followers of the Demonic Path, Myriad ghosts attack; The underworld, Yama-King collects life; The great world, has fallen into depravity.

I, Liu Fei:
The BaiTou Temple, the fragrance of porridge floats all over the village; in a six li region, one sword slays the dragon.
Whatever your evil demons, whatever your crooked path, there is only a single word – Cut!>
